meta.notes: All predictions are publicly timestamped and validated via GitHub Actions

predictions.statement: Nova OS public validation pipeline will remain continuously online and generate verifiable metrics at regular intervals.
predictions.resolution_criteria: Heartbeat, metrics, and ledger files update automatically via GitHub Actions.

predictions.statement: All validation outputs produced by Nova OS will be cryptographically hash-linked to prior outputs, forming an immutable public chain.
predictions.resolution_criteria: Each metrics file references the hash of the previous metrics state.

predictions.statement: Nova OS can accumulate tens of thousands of independent validation events without manual intervention.
predictions.resolution_criteria: Ledger.jsonl grows continuously with timestamped validation entries.
